#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,max=0,min=101,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    scanf("%d",&n);
    int arr[n];
    while(t--)
    {
        max=0;min=101;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
        scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
        if(arr[i]<min)
        {
            min=arr[i];
        }
        if(arr[i]>max)
        {
            max=arr[i];
        }
        }
        printf("%d\n",(max-min));
    }
    
    return 0;
}
